fields.name: 📜 Step 1: Read and Accept the Rules
fields.value: Visit the <#558289444927700992> channel and read through the rules. When you've read them all, and you're ready to follow them during your time in Compulsion, add a reaction to the bottom and then come back here to do the next step.

fields.name: 💬 Wanna prog? Ping Brakk
fields.value: Once you have all that set up, if you are interested in Progression raiding with us, send a quick DM to <@512839235921772544> with your main toon's name, class, and spec so I can add you to the Raid Recruits list. We'll use this list as our primary input for sourcing raiders for season 3.

title: Getting Started with Compulsion!
description:
Welcome adventurers!  🐉 Compulsion is excited to have you join us for some incredible experiences. To get started, please do the following tasks to get yourself ready to roll.
​
​

footer.text: Thanks for keeping your info up to date! Let’s keep Compulsion strong 💪 and organized 🧙‍♂️.
